name: holygrailcss
description: A minimal, responsive, style-agnostic CSS framework.

scripts.docs: sass scss/docs.scss doc/docs.css --style expanded && sass scss/docs.scss doc/docs.min.css --style compressed
scripts.build: sass scss/style.scss dist/style.css --style expanded && sass scss/style.scss dist/style.min.css --style compressed
scripts.build-sass: sass --style expanded --source-map true scss/style.scss dist/style.css  &&  sass --output-style expanded --source-map true scss/docs.scss doc/docs.css

author: Manuel Ruiz
